result.reason: The importer incorrectly rejects RDCMan 2.2 files if they contain the 'programVersion="2.2"' attribute, causing an 'Unsupported file version' error because the check (version < 2.7) fails for version 2.2.
result.approach: Modify VerifyFileVersion in RemoteDesktopConnectionManagerDeserializer.cs to explicitly allow version 2.2 even if the programVersion attribute is present.
